text: The Aragó Tunnelhttp://hemeroteca.lavanguardia.es/preview/2000/10/14/pagina-1/34096438/pdf.html?search=%22t%C3%BAnel%20d%27Arag%C3%B3%22 is a railway tunnel in the Spanish city of Barcelona. Built in the 1970s, it replaced the previously existing railway that ran in a cutting through the city centre. ==Services== The tunnel is served by Rodalies de Catalunya services R2, R2 Nord and R2 Sud and regional lines R11, R13, R14, R15 and R16. ==Stations== *Barcelona Sants *Passeig de Gràcia *El Clot-Aragó ==See also== *Meridiana Tunnel ==References== Category:Transport in Barcelona Category:Underground commuter rail
title: Aragó Tunnel
